works.complaint:
There is a content on google maligning my partner's  
name ie Andrea Lucia Faria de Almeida. I know the person's name who is  
maligning this. Some times back ie 5 months back, this person has also  
written to Google for withdrawing and taking this name away from this
site.  
However, he has started to malign again saying that my partner has taken  

money and is a cheater. He is trying to settle personal issues in this  
website, which is not true. I can provide the person's name, no. and mail 

id and where her lives.
My parter is seriously depressed and wants to die because of this  
defamation. She is already suffering from one of the dreaded disease and  

this defamation is killing her.
I request help from Google that this person should not be able to post
this  
time and again the same things and should be withdrawn. Else I need to
take  
the help of legal authorities at UK and international court intervention.
